statements: DELETE FROM ConservationData WHERE region = 'Africa' AND conservation_status = 'Endangered';
DELETE FROM ConservationData WHERE region = 'North America' AND population < 10000;
DELETE FROM conservation_records WHERE location = 'Forest' AND conservation_success = true;
DELETE FROM population_data WHERE species_name='Tiger' AND population_size > 1000;
DELETE FROM conservation_records WHERE observation_date='2023-07-10' AND conservation_success = TRUE;
DELETE FROM observation WHERE observer_name = 'Jane Doe'
DELETE FROM ConservationEfforts WHERE effort_type = 'Habitat Restoration'
